dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A listener from Astana just wrote in, asking if they should bother putting away their winter coat yet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A listener from Astana just wrote in, asking if they should bother putting away their winter coat yet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I was just looking at that forecast. They are uh, definitely not ready to pack it away. We're talking about potential snowfall and rain on the 19th.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I was just looking at that forecast. They are uh, definitely not ready to pack it away. We're talking about potential snowfall and rain on the nineteenth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: April 19: Partly cloudy with occasional light precipitation, including rain and snow.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and the temperature is supposed to drop to minus five Celsius that night, so icy conditions are a real possibility.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and the temperature is supposed to drop to minus five Celsius that night, so icy conditions are a real possibility.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Night temperatures will drop to "3¦"5ÂC, with daytime highs of +4¦+6ÂC. Icy conditions are possible overnight"drivers and pedestrians are advised to be cautious.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's like, classic spring whiplash. But then, get this, by the 20th, they're forecasting a high of plus twenty-one degrees!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's like, classic spring whiplash. But then, get this, by the twentieth, they're forecasting a high of plus twenty-one degrees!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Temperatures will rise significantly to 0¦"2ÂC at night and +19¦+21ÂC during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Twenty-one? That's a huge jump. So from freezing at night to almost t-shirt weather during the day in just twenty-four hours.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Twenty-one? That's a huge jump. So from freezing at night to almost t-shirt weather during the day in just twenty-four hours.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. But it comes with those strong southwest winds, gusts up to twenty meters per second.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. But it comes with those strong southwest winds, gusts up to twenty meters per second.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Southwest winds at 9"14 m/s, with gusts reaching 20 m/s during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So hold onto your hat if you're out for that walk. And then thunderstorms roll in on the 21st.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So hold onto your hat if you're out for that walk. And then thunderstorms roll in on the twenty first.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: April 21: Partly cloudy, with rain and thunderstorms expected in the afternoon.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, with more of those gusty winds. It's a real mixed bag for Almaty and Astana this weekend.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, with more of those gusty winds. It's a real mixed bag for Almaty and Astana this weekend.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Residents of Astana and Almaty can expect another round of unpredictable spring weather, with snowfall, rain, thunderstorms, and a sudden warm-up forecast between April 19 and 21.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The key takeaway seems to be, um, keep that umbrella handy and maybe just leave the winter gear by the door.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The key takeaway seems to be, um, keep that umbrella handy and maybe just leave the winter gear by the door.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Don't get caught off guard by this unpredictable weather.
